ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and have any fruits that they desire:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And such fruits as they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the fruits that they desire (will be ready at hand).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and fruits of the kind which they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And among fruits whichever they may desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And fruits, such as they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And fruits such as they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and such fruits as their hearts desire:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And fruits such as they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and shall have fruits such as they desire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And fruits such as they shall desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and [enjoying] such fruits as they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (they shall have) fruits,- all they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And fruits, such as they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and have such fruits as they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And fruits from whatever they desire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:42] and fruits such as they desire: this is meant to point out that eating and drinking in Paradise is [done] according to their desires, in contrast to [the case in] this world, where it is predominantly determined by what people are able to procure. It will also be said to them:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And fruits) different kinds of fruit (such as they desire).
